description:
The curtain finally rises on the trainees` debut performance, but an unprecedented number of DES soldiers arrive on the scene! Leaving the concert half-finished, the Flying Get is forced to retreat. In spite of the members` opposition, Tsubasa cancels the conert on Lancastar. Faced with the conflicting emotions of Nagisa and her friends and the safety of the members, how will Tsubasa handle this dilemma!?
Source: crunchyroll
